newsitem.title: UK: UK manufacturers, distributors stocks fall in Q2.
newsitem.headline: UK manufacturers, distributors stocks fall in Q2.

text.p: The Office for National Statistics issued the following provisional data on manufacturers, wholesalers and retailers stocks in the second quarter of 1996-
STOCKS (in mln stg) Q2 Q1 Q2,1995

The ONS said the ratio of stocks to output fell to 91.3 at the end of June from 91.9 at the end of March. The ratio of retail stocks to sales fell to 107.9 at the end of June from 108.9 at the end of March.
Total stocks showed the first negative figure since the third quarter of 1993, the ONS said, and the largest drop since the second quarter of 1993.
This was largely due to the first decrease in manufacturing stocks since Q3 1993 and the first fall in motor trade stocks since Q3 1992, it said.
